dct_title_s: Carta reducida del Oceano Asiático, ó Mar del Sur
dct_description_sm: compuesta de orden del Exmo. Señor Marqués de Croix, Virrey, Governador, y Capitan General del Reyno de la Noueva España, y de los Excertios de S.M. ; ... Mexico, y Octubre 30 de 1770, Miguel Costansó ; D. Tomás Lopez Geógrafo de los dominios de S.M. lo gravó en Madrid año de 1771 ; gravado la Letra, é impreso por Hipolito Ricarte.
Blue print copy of map owned by Bohemian Club of San Francisco.
Inscription on verso: "Map of Pacific Coast, Mexico, Lower California, California, made after Portolas's expedition 1769-70."
Latitudinal and longitudinal lines; rhumb lines.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Includes handwriting: "Traced by Eden M. Doyle BS., Stanford 1890"
Includes an explanatory note, hand-signed: "Menlo Park Dec. 1899. John S. Doyle."
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
